Package com.gsm.service.impl

Class ZaloServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gsm.service.impl.ZaloServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ZaloService
    @Service
public class ZaloServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements ZaloService
    The concrete implementation of the ZaloService interface. Handles all business logic related to Zalo Mini App integration.

    • Method Detail

      • loginByZaloId

        @Transactional(readOnly=true)
public UserDto loginByZaloId​(java.lang.String zaloUserId)
        Attempts to log in a user using their Zalo ID. Contains extensive logging and a direct JDBC query for debugging potential issues with the JPA layer.
        Specified by:
        loginByZaloId in interface ZaloService
        Parameters:
        zaloUserId - The user's unique Zalo identifier.
        Returns:
        A UserDto if the user is found and linked.
        Throws:
        ResourceNotFoundException - if no account is linked to the Zalo ID.

      • linkAccount

        @Transactional
public UserDto linkAccount​(ZaloLinkRequestDto linkRequest)
        Links a Zalo account to a system user account after validating credentials.
        Specified by:
        linkAccount in interface ZaloService
        Parameters:
        linkRequest - DTO with Zalo ID, username, and password.
        Returns:
        A UserDto of the linked account.
        Throws:
        ResourceNotFoundException - if the username does not exist.
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the Zalo account is already linked to another user.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the password is incorrect.

      • findStylesAndColorsBySaleOrderNo

        @Transactional(readOnly=true)
public ZaloSaleOrderInfoDto findStylesAndColorsBySaleOrderNo​(java.lang.String saleOrderNo)
        Finds distinct style/color combinations for a given Sale Order number.
        Specified by:
        findStylesAndColorsBySaleOrderNo in interface ZaloService
        Parameters:
        saleOrderNo - The business number of the Sale Order.
        Returns:
        A DTO containing the sale order's ID and the list of styles/colors.

      • saveProductionOutputs

        @Transactional
public void saveProductionOutputs​(java.util.List<ProductionOutputDto> outputDtos)
        Saves a list of production output records. It validates the input, finds the associated user and sale order, maps DTOs to entities, and performs a batch save operation.
        Specified by:
        saveProductionOutputs in interface ZaloService
        Parameters:
        outputDtos - The list of production output data to save.

      • mapUserToDto

        private UserDto mapUserToDto​(User user)
        A private helper method to map a User entity to a UserDto. This ensures that only necessary, non-sensitive data is exposed.
        Parameters:
        user - The User entity to map.
        Returns:
        The resulting UserDto.
